article_title: Will Walmart solve the U.S. healthcare-access crisis?
article_text:

twitter.description: More than 7 million Americans can wave around their shiny new insurance cards thanks to the Affordable Care Act (ACA), but insurance access isn’t solving an even more pressing problem: The U....
twitter.title: Can Walmart help to solve the U.S. healthcare-access crisis?
